message.default:
In 2017, Pure Writer launched its first version on Google Play, starting a long "five-year project". During these 5 years, we submitted a total of 9,000 updates, ranging from v1.0 to v22.0.0, in the latest version, we have implemented great functions such as OneDrive support for Cloud Sync & Smooth Unlimited Words.

Therefore, for the new Spring, Pure Writer Pro (lifetime), originally priced at US$24, is discounted to US$14.99(tax not included).
message.zh:
在 2023 新的春天期间，纯纯写作 v22.0.0 大版本更新发布（支持「阿里云盘」和 OneDrive 云同步），纯纯写作 Pro（永久会员）现提供短期大幅降价优惠！

在纯纯写作 Pro 页面底部可查看最新优惠售价。
